comment: 0/10 would not recommend. I'm on my last semester of graduate school and out of alllllll the professors I've had over the years, she is BY FAR the absolute worse.

This professor could not have been less prepared to teach the class. While trying to demonstrate problems live she struggled and then gave up. The "lectures" were problems scribbled on yellow legal pad or done in MS paint. Any learning accomplished in this class was accomplished solely by the students with zero assistance from the professor.

Dr. Furterer is a professional and over-achiever; however, she treats this intro class as advanced course. Don't really teach much but grade you like you should know material well (but she forgot that not everyone is the same major, that's why we need this intro class). She maybe is knowledgeable enough but definite not a teaching material.
